page.title: 13REV.MIDDLETONS WORK. (2)
page.content: Rev.Middleton said the difference between town Parsons and country Parsons is that town Parsons don't get to know the people in town as well as country Parsons do in a village like Easthorpe.This is because people are coming and going in the town and haven't got the time to get to know the Parson very well.The country Parson gets to know some of the families very much indeed so when things happen to them it's easier for him to help because he knows their family.He said he enjoys his work but he's also a human being and there are some parts of his work that he doesn't enjoy as much as others.He likes people and thinks they are interesting.They're sometimes difficult but none the less they are always interesting.Being with people is part of his work.
